results.description: انڈیا کی شفالی ورما نے نہ صرف بلے باز سچن تندولکر کا ریکارڈ توڑا بلکہ اگلے ہی دن دوسری نصف سنچری بھی بنا لی۔ اس وقت ان کی عمر صرف 15 سال ہے۔
results.shortTitle: سچن تندولکر کا ریکارڈ توڑنے والی انڈین کرکٹر
results.title: انڈیا کے لیے نصف سنچری بنانے والی سب سے کم عمر کرکٹر شفالی ورما جنھوں نے سچن تندولکر کا ریکارڈ توڑا

results.description: Fifteen-year-old Shafali Verma breaks Sachin Tendulkar's 30-year record as the youngest player to score a fifty for India.
results.title: India's Shafali Verma, 15, becomes youngest player to score a fifty for country

results.description: Deepak Chahar takes 6-7 in Nagpur - the best-ever bowling figures in a Twenty20 international - as India beat Bangladesh by 30 runs in Nagpur.
results.shortTitle: India's Chahar sets T20 bowling record
results.title: Deepak Chahar: India bowler takes record 6-7 in win over Bangladesh

results.description: Bangladesh beat India in a Twenty20 international for the first time as they take a 1-0 lead in the three-match series.
results.shortTitle: Bangladesh in first T20 win over India
results.title: India v Bangladesh: Tigers seal first T20 win over hosts in Delhi

results.description: گذشتہ دنوں بالی وڈ اداکارہ اور کرکٹر وراٹ کوہلی کی اہلیہ انوشکا شرما نے انڈین کرکٹ کے بارے میں کچھ متنازع معاملات پر کھل کر بات کی۔
results.shortTitle: انوشکا شرما سابق کرکٹر پر کیوں بھڑک اٹھیں؟
results.title: انوشکا شرما سابق کرکٹر فاروق انجینیئر پر کیوں بھڑکیں؟

results.description: Fixtures, results and scorecards from Bangladesh's tour of India, featuring two Tests and three Twenty20 internationals.
results.title: Bangladesh in India 2019

thumbnail.altText: Bangladesh's Liton Das and India wicketkeeper MS Dhoni

results.description: India legend MS Dhoni's international career could be over after the team's chief selector says they are "moving on" from the wicketkeeper.
results.title: MS Dhoni: India selector MSK Prasad says team will "move on" from former captain

results.description: India take the final two South Africa wickets in consecutive balls to wrap up a dominant win by an innings and 202 runs and secure a 3-0 series whitewash.
results.shortTitle: India wrap up series whitewash over SA
results.title: India v South Africa: Hosts wrap up series whitewash with dominant third Test win

results.description: South Africa batsman Dean Elgar withdraws from the third Test against India after being hit on the helmet by a short-pitched delivery.
results.shortTitle: Proteas' Elgar withdraws after head blow
results.title: India v South Africa: Dean Elgar withdraws from third Test after head injury

about.label: Concussion and head trauma in sport
about.preferredLabel: Concussion and head trauma in sport

results.description: India thrash South Africa by an innings and 137 runs in the second Test in Pune to secure a record 11th home Test series win in a row.
results.shortTitle: India thrash SA to claim Test record
results.title: India v South Africa: Hosts secure record 11th straight home Test series win

thumbnail.altText: India captain Virat Kohli celebrates against South Africa

results.description: India dismiss South Africa for 275 for a lead of 326 after three days of the second Test in Pune.
results.shortTitle: India in command after Ashwin haul
results.title: India v South Africa: Ravichandran Ashwin haul maintains hosts' dominance

results.description: Mayank Agarwal makes a century for the second match in succession as India post 273-3 on day one of the second Test with South Africa.
results.shortTitle: Agarwal hits second century for India
results.title: India v South Africa: Mayank Agarwal hits another century

results.description: India dominate South Africa to win the first Test of their three-match home series by 203 runs in Visakhapatnam.
results.shortTitle: Dominant India beat SA in first Test
results.title: India v South Africa: Mohammed Shami takes 5-35 as dominant hosts win

results.description: India's Rohit Sharma becomes the first batsman to score two hundreds in his first Test as opener and breaks the record for the most sixes in a Test.
results.shortTitle: India opener Rohit breaks sixes record
results.title: India v South Africa: Rohit Sharma breaks record for most sixes in a Test

thumbnail.altText: India batsman Rohit Sharma plays a shot

results.description: India captain Virat Kohli is given one demerit point - moving him closer to a suspension - after making contact with South Africa's Beuran Hendricks.
results.shortTitle: Kohli near to ban after Hendricks clash
results.title: Virat Kohli: India captain close to ban after Beuran Hendricks clash

results.description: انڈیا میں پولیس نے دو سٹے بازوں کے خلاف انڈیا کی خواتین کی قومی کرکٹ ٹیم کی دو ارکان کو میچ فکس کرنے پر آمادہ کرنے کے لیے رابطہ کرنے کے الزام میں مقدمہ درج کیا ہے۔

results.description: Australia batsman Steve Smith moves above India captain Virat Kohli to regain the number one spot in the ICC Test batting rankings.

results.description: انڈین کرکٹر وراٹ کوہلی 43 سنچریاں بنا چکے ہیں اور صرف مزید سات سنچریاں بنا کر وہ سچن تندولکر کا ون ڈے انٹرنیشنل میں سب سے زیادہ سنچریاں بنانے کا ریکارڈ توڑ دیں گے۔
results.shortTitle: کوہلی تندولکر کا سنچریوں کا ریکارڈ توڑنے کے قریب
results.title: کوہلی کو ون ڈے سنچریوں کا عالمی ریکارڈ بنانے کے لیے کتنا انتظار کرنا پڑے گا؟
